Hi,

I am using JUnitTestRunner to run tests.
My project contain many suite and each suite contain classes and each class
include tests.
I am creating new directory for each class and seperate log file for each
test.
For this I nedd listener at the begining and end of each test.
I am using the formatter so I get notify in start and end of each test
include before test but not for beforeClass.

Is there a way do that(formatter event when beforeClass called)?
Is there other way for that ?

Thanks




--
